snippet: Following the wishes of Cy Twombly, his foundation has donated paintings and sculptures to the Tate Modern in London.
abstract: Carol Vogel Inside Art column; Cy Twombly Foundation has donated all works in Cy Twombly gallery at Tate Modern in London to the museum; new iteration of Big Bambu, labyrinthine jungle of bamboo that opened at Metropolitan Museum of Art in 2010, will open at Israel Museum in Jerusalem; reopening of East Building of the National Gallery of Art in Washington in 2016 will reveal both improved spaces and new acquisitions.
lead_paragraph: Following the wishes of Cy Twombly, his foundation has donated paintings and sculptures to the Tate Modern in London.

headline.main: Cy Twombly Works Donated to Tate Modern
headline.print_headline: Twombly Works Donated to Tate Modern
